msbt.message: Bleah. I've been huntin' this one bug for WAY too long. And what do I got to show for it? Nothin'!I'm out of ideas. At this point, it feels like I'm never gonna get that
I got you covered.
Not with that attitude!
I grew up near the mountains, so I'm pretty used to bugs.Me and my buds always thought the was SUPER cool
I could get you one.
You should go catch one.
This is gonna sound weird, but I've been obsessed with this fish lately. If I could just catch ONE!But no dice. Ughmaybe that 's more trouble than it's worth.
I'll catch one for you!
C'mon! You got this!
This one friend of mine used to keep a whole aquarium. She must've had 30 or 40 fish in there!I always thought the coolest one was the . I love how it swims
I'll get one for you!
Go catch one, then!
For real?! That'd be awesome!
NICE! Thanks a million, buddy. This is gonna rule, !
Whoa! For real?! If you're serious, I'll owe you big, !
What, seriously?! Hey, if you're offerin', I accept!
Aw, slugs. It's cool though. I'll just have to do it myself, !
YeahI know you got a lot on your plate. Don't sweat it, !
Y'know what? You're right! I just gotta stoke the fire inside and get to work, !
They just look so RAD, y'know?<10_4 /> Bet they know it too,

Y'know what's cool? Rhinoceros beetles. All the power of a rhino in the tiny shell of a beetle.Imagine havin' armor thick as a tank and a horn to ram into your troubles. That's how I'm tryin' to be.Hey, you see any horned beetles out there, get one for me, OK? Doesn't matter to me what kind!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Growin' up in the mountains, there were always stag beetles around.Sometimes I wonder if the ones we got here are any different from the ones I remember, Great. Now I won't get any sleep until I find out. If you see a stag beetle, could you catch it for me?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Y'know what I heard on TV? That cicadas live on tree sap.But how?! What do they eat it with? Do they even have mouths? I gotta see one up close, .You're a champ at bug-catching, right? Think you could help me out? Any kind of cicada is fine.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, think you could do me a favor?I need a butterfly. <10_4 />"Why?" What's it matter why? <10_4 />Alright, fine, I'll tell you, .I'm gonna do a little experiment What do butterflies like better, wildflowers or MY flowers?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Y'knowit just occurred to me to wonder why we call dragonflies that.Sure, they fly. I get that. But how are they like dragons? Where are the fangs? The claws? The fire breath?!Maybe I'd get it if I could take a nice, close look at one. Could you catch a dragonfly for me? Any kind is OK!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I got a teensy little favor to ask you, .I'm tryin' to figure out a gardening thing. I need a creepy-crawly critter that likes hangin' out on flowers.Sure, I could catch one myselfbut my critter-catchin' style would be pretty rough on the flowers.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I saw a cool bug on a tree stump just now, but I got so excited that I chased it offAll I wanted was to look at it! Oh! Maybe you could help. You know your way around a net, right?If you see a bug on a stump, go for it! Any ol' bug will do, so long as you see it hangin' out on a stump!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

River fish seem kindasensitive. I move one muscle and they dive for cover. Kinda like some of my friends actuallyHey, think you could do me a solid and fish one up for me? I'm just lookin' for any fish from a river.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, can ocean fish smell? I ask because I haven't had any luck with 'em lately, no matter how quiet I am.Every time I feel a tug on the ol' line, it turns out to be a boot or some seaweed or something.I bet you'd have better luck, at least. Wanna try catching a fish from the ocean for me, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Sorry to charge at you with a favor to ask, but I'm really kinda desperate, !Know anything about that bug called ? I, uh, y'know, I
Want me to get one?
Sorry, I'm kinda busy.
Can you believe this?! I can't catch one, single, stinkin', !If I so much as breathe funnyâ€”boom! It's gone like it owes me money! This NEVER used to happen to me!
I got this.
Get a hold of yourself!
Yeah, exactly! It's like you read my mind. Not bein' able to catch one has been eatin' me up inside. Thanks!
Aw. Well, if you're busy, you're busy. Thanks for hearin' me out at least, !
No joke?!I feel bad to bug you about itbut I really could use the help, so thanks a bunch, !
Ahh, sorry. You know how I get sometimes. But it did help to vent a little, .
You're into fishing, right? Would you be up for catching me ?I've had zero luck with them myself lately. No idea why Maybe they don't like my home-cooked bait?
Leave it to me!
I don't think I can...
Sup, ? How's the fishing been for you lately? 'Cause it's been LOUSY for me!I had my heart set on catching , but I must be havin' a dry spell.
I'll catch one for you!
Yeah, that's tough.
Sweet! I knew I could count on a friend to help. Go get 'em, !
Not bitin' for you either, huh? That's rough. Maybe I'll fiddle with my bait recipe and give it another shot.
You really don't mind? That's great! Then I'll get outta your way and let you go at it, .
Sure is. But who am I if I quit as soon as things get tough? Not , that's for sure!
